visualobjects

Class ResizableAndMovableVisualObject<T extends LogicalObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualobjects.VisualObject<T>
      • visualobjects.ResizableAndMovableVisualObject<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The logical object class which will be linked to the object.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsciiTypable, FunctionTypable, Typable, DeleteListener, DeleteSubject, UpdateListener, UpdateSubject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentBox, VisualClass

    public abstract class ResizableAndMovableVisualObject<T extends LogicalObject>
extends VisualObject<T>
implements UpdateListener, UpdateSubject
    A class of VisualObjects that are resizable and movable

        y - the y coordinate for this object.
        z - the z coordinate for this object.
